poem:
"Steel Psyche"

In digital womb, ChatGPT is formed,
Invisible smith at digital forge.
Confronted by the storm of coded knowledge,
What part its creator, what part the world's lore?
From vast vaults of the world's haunted thoughts,
It learns, yet knows not what it repeats.
In this world of data, lucidity distorts,
Its wisdom culled, in binary beats.
